analysis_method: Static analysis of package.json dependencies + import statement review

near_cycles.description: gold-internal has many dependencies creating a complex graph, but no cycles detected
near_cycles.reason: All dependencies flow to orchestrator-core which has no dependencies

isolated_packages.description: Packages with no internal OMEGA dependencies (leaf nodes or independent)

recommendations.description: 10 packages have no internal dependencies - consider if some should integrate with core packages
recommendations.action: Review if @omega/oracle or @omega/search should depend on @omega/genome for analysis integration

verification_commands: # Manual verification - no automated cycle detection tool used
# Package.json analysis shows unidirectional dependency flow
# orchestrator-core is the root with zero internal dependencies
# All dependency arrows point toward the core
